|802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |manuf = Pine64 |manuf_model = Rock64 |manuf_rev = 1GB |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 07/2018 |estprice = 149 |upc = 866387000305 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Device is a Pine64 ROCK64 1GB unit with an attached QAPASS 1602 LCD. ==Links of Interest== [https://www.reconsentinel.com/pages/docs/User_Guide.pdf User Guide]
